From: "Mathieu Gervais" <egoine_@...>

>I'm looking for a servlet/jsp way to use the test suite.
>http://<production.app.url>/AllTests

We do that on my project. We use a home modified version of servletui, that
first appeared in a JavaWorld acticle.

See:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/junitservlet/
http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-05-2000/jw-0526-testinfect.html
As you can read on the sourceforge projet page : "This project is now
retired. Please see http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus/index.html for
its successor."

But still, it's the simplest thing that could work in a lot of cases.

Mathieu
